patterns: Is there any special incentive given to girl students which is not available in most of the other IITs?
Why IIT Mandi is special for girls?
responses:
IIT Mandi especially encourages girls to join our B.Tech. programme.

 Special Incentives for female students in IIT Mandi :

1.) All female BTech students will get a merit scholarship including full tuition fee waiver and Rs. 1,000/- per month for all 4 years of their BTech.

2.) ACM, IEEE or ASME student membership will be provided by the institute to female students admitted in B.Tech.

For more information, please go to - 
https://students.iitmandi.ac.in/girl_students.php
https://students.iitmandi.ac.in/prospective_WS.php

Or, talk to our Female B.Tech Students - ####

patterns: Where will be the freshers be accommodated?
which campus for first yearites?
In which campus first year students will stay?
responses: At North Campus, Kamand.

patterns: How developed is the IIT Mandi campus at Kamand?
IIT Mandi Campus
How is the campus of IIT Mandi?
is permanent campus of iit mandi ready?
responses: IIT Campus is spread over North and South campuses in Kamand. North and south campuses are contiguous and interconnected with road and walkways. Phase 1 construction of the south campus is complete and north campus is expected to complete in 2021. Faculty and students are living on both south and north campuses. Most of the academic activities of B.Tech students are planned in the north campus.

patterns: How is the weather in Kamand like?
How is the weather in IIT Mandi?
How cold is it at iit mandi?
How is the climate at iit mandi?
responses: Weather becomes chilly after mid-October, and in winter, there is the occasional snowfall, especially in the mountains above Kamand. But in general, we have a  long winter vacation from early December until mid-February to keep the cold at bay. The weather is usually pleasant, especially in the evenings and is ideal for nature enthusiasts who want to explore the serene surroundings of IIT Mandi.

patterns: What are the good places to hang out in mandi town?
How is mandi town?
What are some places to visit in mandi?
responses: Mandi has a fairly good market, which can provide you with almost anything. Hotels like Raj Mahal, Regent Palms, Treat are good for dinners. Dominos, Raman Bakers, Daily Dose Cafe, Sai Sweets have their share of fast food fanatics. Indira Market, built around a sunken lake, - the Mandi version of a super mall - is a delightful place for making little discoveries.

provisional shop
stationary shop

patterns: What facilities will be given in the hostel?
does iit mandi has good hostels?
how are the hostels of iit mandi?
What are the conditions of hostels allotted to fresher's at IIT mandi?
responses: Every student will be given a bed ,chair and a locker in his room.Every room have a balcony.Rooms are quite spacious.There is aqua guard at each floor.Appropriate number of washrooms are at each floor.There are 2 washing machine for washing clothes. Hostel itself have sports equipment. There is a water cooler in the mess.Wifi connectivity in the hostel is good.

Here is a list of the facilities/equipment you'll get in the hostels:

1. Automatic Washing machines
2. Laundry dryers
3. Water purifier and cooler
4. Iron with iron table
5. Microwave
6. Induction cooktop
7. Electric kettle

responses: Though hostels are 24 hrs open, residents are to follow some rules for their own safety. Go through Appendix V hostel rules for more info.

patterns: Why there is no separate hostel for PG students?
Are there separate hostels for UG and PG students?
responses: For interaction and camaraderie, IIT Mandi follows a tradition of mixed hostels where UG and PG students are put up in the same hostel. Each program may be allotted a floor or wing so that students can stay with their classmates.

patterns: How is the internet facility on campus?
responses: Internet is pretty good in the Institute and is uncapped, i.e., unlimited hi-speed net at all times.

patterns: How is the mess food?
Is mess food good?
is mess food really bad at iit mandi?
is mess food tasty in iit mandi?
responses: The mess food is nutritional and offers a huge variety from matar paneer to chole bhature to non veg food and not to mention the special dinner at every month end. In case you are unhappy about the mess food you can give feedback in the feedback register provided as well as talk to your mess secretary.

patterns: What are sports facilities in IIT Mandi?
How is the sports culture of IIT Mandi?
responses:
Sports activities are coordinated by the Principal Sports Officer, Faculty Sports Advisor and PTIs. A team of highly experienced coaches and ground staff work under their direction to help you take part in the games of your choice. Participate in various tournaments like Inter-IIT, Aagaaz, Rann-Neeti and other in-house tournaments.
At Kamand, we have fields for Cricket, Football and Hockey, Basketball, Tennis, Squash, Badminton, TT and Volleyball courts. TT and Foosball tables are also available in most hostels. There is also Swimming pool, gym and yoga room etc.

patterns: What will be the courses in 1st sem of B.Tech?
What are first year B.tech courses?
responses:
There will be common courses for all of you in the first semester. These courses include Engineering Drawing, Electrical systems around us, Computation for Engineers, Mathematics, Reverse Engineering and English I. Apart from Maths and English all courses involve Lab work, and offer a thorough understanding of the subjects, not to speak of easy grades!
More about courses: http://iitmandi.ac.in/academics/courses.php

patterns: Will we be buying books or we can get them from the library?
from where do we have to buy books for courses?
what about the books?
do i have to buy books beforehand?
responses: In general, you can get the e-books for the materials that the teacher specifies. Also, you can get them from the library, though the library may have only limited copies. Local bookshops in Mandi or online stores are also of help, so are the seniors. Moodle web pages on our intranet site has all the course materials posted by faculty and students.

patterns: What is the procedure for getting the MCM scholarships? , MCM scholarships in IIT Mandi?
responses:
Procedure for getting the MCM scholarships:
Income certificates are submitted at the time of admission as mentioned on the website and applications are collected in September. The decision is made by the Senate to award the scholarships, and later in the second semester, students are given the scholarship reimbursing their earlier tuition fees and that of the second semester.  Other details can be found here:
http://iitmandi.ac.in/academics/scholarship.php

patterns: Can freshers bring laptops in the first sem?
should I bring my own laptop?
Is laptop a requisite for first year?
responses: There is no restriction in bringing a laptop to the Institute. It would be better if you had a laptop for the course on computation with Phython-language programming, but then the PC lab is also there.

patterns: If I have any problem regarding any matter then to whom I have to contact?
Contact detail of IIT mandi

patterns: Is there Ragging?  Does IIT Mandi have policies against it?
responses: Zero Tolerance for ragging. We have the following committees  to take care of any issues, Student Welfare and Disciplinary Committee (SWDC), Anti-Ragging Committee (ARC).
